mods.abstract: Excerpt from a Louisiana Hayride radio segment, featuring Frank Page (host), Elvis Presley (performer), Scotty Moore (performer), and Bill Black (performer), broadcast on October 14, 1954 on radio station KWKH (Shreveport, La.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
